entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpResponseMessage #91036
  • illink roslyn analyzer: resolve code-style analysis warnings and update `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisCSharpCodeStyleVersion` to sync with `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS` #91030
    8.0.0
  • coreclr/tools: resolve code-style analysis warnings and update `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisCSharpCodeStyleVersion` to sync with `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS` #91028
    8.0.0
  • Tracking issue: Fix failing test on mono with static interface methods #91027
  • Retry Counts are high in Http3 Tests #91017
    9.0.0
  • Consider removing CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTARRAY and CORINFO_HELP_ISINSTANCEOFARRAY from JIT/EE interface #91016
  • Test crashes on System.Net.Security Test Suite #91014
  • Add test for --make-repro-path ILC option #91013
    Future
  • InlineArray documentation tracking #91012
  • [wasm] perf pipeline broken - `Unable to determine the .NET SDK used for net8.0` on `main` #91011
    9.0.0
  • Can't build runtime with recent SDK due to `IsTrimmable` errors #91010
  • [API Proposal]: PeriodicTimer with CancellationToken support #91005
  • Improve the C++ codebase by consuming the GSL #91004
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add modern, span-based alternative to `StringInfo.GetTextElementEnumerator` #91003
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryGetOnlyChunk to StringBuilder #91000
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ToLowerOrdinal()` & `ToUpperOrdinal()` #90999
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add additional overloads for `Random.Next*` #90998
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of `Type.GetMethod` that takes a name, generic parameter count, binding flags and parameter types #90995
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Type.IsReferenceType` #90993
  • [API Proposal]: Make `ValueTuple<>` implement `IFormattable` #90992
  • Options source generator shouldn't use random names #90990
    8.0.0
  • Config generator doesn't match nullability semantics of built-in Bind #90987
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableHashSet<T>.SetEquals always creates a new HashSet<T> #90986
    9.0.0
  • AddJwtBearer doesn't consider system proxy settings #90985
  • [browser] Support `WasmRuntimeAssetsLocation` in Wasm SDK #90979
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets: stop using legacy runtime graph #90977
    8.0.0
  • Config generator emits uncompilable code for certain type conflicts #90976
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent behaviour between List<>.BinarySearch and ImmutableList<>.BinarySearch #90975
    9.0.0
  • Config generator wrongly emits init-related exception in bind operations #90974
    8.0.0
  • The "while" loop doesn't enter when it is referenced by an asynchronous method #90972
  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #90971
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add span-based `StringInfo.GetNextTextElement` #91020
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: More customization of `DateTimeFormatInfo` #91002
    Future
  • [8.0] [wasm] Build failure: dotnet-install: Failed to check the disk space #91025
    8.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers #84995
    9.0.0
  • Port System.IO documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88568
    8.0.0
  • Config generator generates uncompilable code when there are two same-named types in two different namespaces #90969
  • InterfaceMap returns non-GenericMethodDefinition for static abstract interface generic methods on the target type #74132
    8.0.0
  • Equals on EventId from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging checks only ID #90831
    Future
  • Config generator is generating unnecessary support code for BindCore #90973
  • Test failure readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test/Depth3Test.sh #88586
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketAsyncEventArgsTest.Finalizer_InvokedWhenNoLongerReferenced #89089
  • Allow SDKs to tweak the error message when ILLink fails #90607
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression, memory usage #90899
    8.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException intermittently crashes test process from DefaultHttpClientFactory.ExpiryTimer_Tick #90919
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (995) -System.IO.IOException #90338
    9.0.0
  • IOS Push Notification Sending Failed with SSL Connection Error #86214
  • Assertion failed in loader: , condition `<disabled>' not met #73617
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17.DroppedWatcher_Collectible #86564
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.FileStreamFlushAsyncThreadPoolDeadlockTest #89702
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert all `EnC_SUPPORTED` to `FEATURE_ENC_SUPPORTED` #91035
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Address warnings from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis upgrade #91034
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Include dotnet/hostfxr/hostpolicy symbols in Microsoft.NETCore.App.Host/Runtime packages #91031
    area-Host
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [main] Forward port metrics tests #91026
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo #91024
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix nullability annotations of MemberDescriptor.AttributeArray #91022
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline build with 9.0 sdk #91021
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][wip] Test linux-x64 full AOT llvm job #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete some dead code` #91018
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91015
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91008
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove --skip-unresolved from illink #91007
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS version to 4.7.0 #91006
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Opportunistically use stack allocation for GC dynamic events #91001
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Fix incomplete type errors when debugging in lldb/gdb (#90873)" #90997
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #90994
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in fgMorphLeafLocal #90988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable `System.IO.Hashing` tests on ios and disable them on tvos #90984
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BOOL #90981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't allocate jiterpreter AOT tables unless AOT was enabled at build time #90978
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90968
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2251098 #90996
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Mask all shift amounts #90991
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Fix `--make-repro-path` ILC option #90989
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Only initialize listeners once #90932
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Fix JIT_ByRefWriteBarrier unwinding on macOS x64 #90967
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90936
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] Fix Type.ContainsGenericParameters for function pointers #90963
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection
  • [release/8.0] Remove dbgshim from platform manifest #90924
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0] Fix config names for CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs #90841
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Bring AggressiveOptimization back on AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted #90980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [NativeAOT] Fix `--make-repro-path` ILC option #90935
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90956
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Initialize module's image ALC for dynamic objects #90912
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #90871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] Update file owner for simd related files #90807
    area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Mask all shift amounts #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Add telemetry for AndroidStripILAfterAOT #90950
    area-Build-mono
  • Bring AggressiveOptimization back on AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted #90966
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Delete duplicate init-distro-rid.sh #90952
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline - use `stable` version of `v8` #90961
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [release/8.0] [NativeAOT] Missing memory fence before bulk move of objects #90941
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix stack_limit handling #90937
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • Just running tests with new EH enabled on all platforms #90790
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • `PEImage` should not permit `m_path` field mutation #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90172
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Docs][tests] Add Mono Profiled AOT Functional Test and doc #90959
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Regression test for issue #86993 #90906
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker Substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Perf optimized find last non-zero element #90960
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Upgrade wasm helix VMs to ubuntu 22.04 #90881
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Fix recording/replay of getExactClasses #90926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
